entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Simpson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 40. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 40. Wind chill minus 53 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
